name: msgpackr-extract
author: Kris Zyp
description: Node addon for string extraction for msgpackr

scripts.before-publish: prebuildify-ci download && prebuildify --target 16.14.2 && set ENABLE_V8_FUNCTIONS=false&& prebuildify --platform-packages --napi --target 16.14.2 && node set-optional-deps.cjs
scripts.prebuild-libc-alpine: prebuildify-cross --image linux-arm64-musl --tag-libc --target 16.14.2 && prebuildify-cross --image alpine --tag-libc --target 16.14.2 && ENABLE_V8_FUNCTIONS=false prebuildify-cross --image linux-arm64-musl --napi --tag-libc --target 16.14.2
scripts.publish-all: cd prebuilds/win32-x64 && npm publish --access public && cd ../darwin-x64 && npm publish --access public && cd ../darwin-arm64 && npm publish --access public && cd ../linux-x64 && npm publish --access public && cd ../linux-arm64 && npm publish --access public  && cd ../linux-arm && npm publish --access public && cd ../.. && npm publish --access public
